scripts.setup:all: docker ps --format '{{.Names}}' | grep -q '^mongodb$' || npm run dock:mongo:up && npm run setup:api && npm run setup:bot
scripts.dev:api: cd laundrobotAPI-main && npm install && npm run dev
scripts.dev:bot: cd laundrobot-telegram-main && pipenv install && pipenv run python bot.py
scripts.dock:mongo:up: docker run -d --name mongodb -p 27017:27017 -v mongodb_data:/data/db --restart always mongo:6
scripts.dock:up: docker rm -f mongodb && docker compose up
